name: Memcached
description: Free and open source, high-performance, distributed memory object caching system
summary: Memcached is an in-memory key-value store for small chunks of arbitrary data (strings, objects) from results of database calls, API calls, or page rendering.
features: Store data in memory for faster access
scenario: When you need to speed up a web application leveraging an in-memory cache server
When you need to cache frequent access data

similar.relationship: A powerful distributed cache server with a wider range of data structures
